title: General
stimulusHtml:
2 points maximum.

Identification (1 point)

• Strain I

Justification (1 point)

• Error bars/CIs from strain I/control/WT do not overlap with strain III/Abc8 deleted strain.

• Mean % survival of strain III/Abc8 deletion falls outside the 95% confidence interval of

strain I/control/WT.

• Strain III/Abc8 deletion shows a statistically significant difference from strain I/control.
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

2 points maximum.

Identification (1 point)

• Strain I

Justification (1 point)

• Error bars/CIs from strain I/control/WT do not overlap with strain III/Abc8 deleted strain.

• Mean % survival of strain III/Abc8 deletion falls outside the 95% confidence interval of

strain I/control/WT.

• Strain III/Abc8 deletion shows a statistically significant difference from strain I/control.

The student response earns one of the following points:

2 points maximum.

Identification (1 point)

• Strain I

Justification (1 point)

• Error bars/CIs from strain I/control/WT do not overlap with strain III/Abc8 deleted strain.

• Mean % survival of strain III/Abc8 deletion falls outside the 95% confidence interval of

strain I/control/WT.

• Strain III/Abc8 deletion shows a statistically significant difference from strain I/control.

The student response earns two of the following points:

2 points maximum.

Identification (1 point)

• Strain I

Justification (1 point)

• Error bars/CIs from strain I/control/WT do not overlap with strain III/Abc8 deleted strain.

• Mean % survival of strain III/Abc8 deletion falls outside the 95% confidence interval of

strain I/control/WT.

• Strain III/Abc8 deletion shows a statistically significant difference from strain I/control.
